title: Same; badge
context: ยง21-18 Same; badge. The symbol of the office of the sergeant-at-arms of each house of the legislature shall be a metal badge in such form as such house shall adopt, bearing the words, among others, &ldquo;Sergeant-at-Arms of the Senate, State of Hawaii&rdquo;, or &ldquo;Sergeant-at-Arms of the House of Representatives, State of Hawaii&rdquo;, as the case may be, and shall be displayed by the sergeant-at-arms in enforcing or carrying out the sergeant-at-arms&rsquo; duties. [L 1969, c 211, pt of ยง1; gen ch 1993]
